title: Government extends subsidies under Electric Mobility Promotion Scheme until FAME launch
description: The government will extend subsidies under the Electric Mobility Promotion Scheme until the launch of FAME-III, said Union Minister H D Kumaraswamy. The EMPS, initially set to end on September 30, will continue to support EV buyers with subsidies until the new scheme is introduced within two months.
